title: 'Boss had thrown the rest of my lunch away': Employee gets even with disrespectful boss after she disapproves of his lunch smell, he stinks up her office
description: This employee seems to think that he and his boss are friends, but let's be real: friends do not treat one another like this.Many folks in the comments section of this Reddit thread called their so-called healthy friendship dynamic into questions, even when it came to their carpooling. Some folks wondered if they even alternate or if the employee is always doing the boss's bidding. The two share an office, and one day, the boss made a snide remark about the smell of the employee's sandwich his wife made him for lunch. When the employee got up from his desk mid-meal to handle a work-related matter quickly. the boss proceeded to toss the rest of the sandwich in the trash without asking. The employee returned to his desk, figured out what happened, and hatched a plan for some petty payback. Let's just say the office was smelling only of this sandwich for the rest of the day.For more stories like this, take a look at this post about some HOA drama!
